objects.text:
• BOLD NACHO FLAVOR
• CRUNCHY TORTILLA CHIPS
• 64 PACK VALUE SIZE
• PERFECT FOR SHARING

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a bold, high-contrast design to highlight a popular snack product. The background is a rich red gradient with abstract triangle patterns and subtle shadow overlays that create depth. At the top left, the "heading" in white uppercase typeface boldly introduces the product brand. Just beneath it, the "subheading" in a large yellow font emphasizes the flavor variant. Midway, the "description" text block outlines key selling points using bullet points in white. The bottom left showcases the "price" element in oversized white text, and beneath it, a bright yellow rectangular "cta_background" holds the “SHOP NOW” call-to-action text ("cta"). On the right side, a prominent product image ("product_image") adds a visual focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Crimson Red (#D4121C, #E32636, #9B0000 gradients)
- Warm Yellow (#FFC72C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#000000 with transparent overlays)
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image uses a bold and energetic color palette dominated by deep red (#B50000) and fiery orange (#FF6A00) to evoke flavor intensity and excitement. The chips are presented in a bright cheese yellow (#F9B233) with shadows of burnt orange (#C14400), providing texture and realism. Black (#000000) and white (#FFFFFF) are used in the logo to create high contrast and brand recognition. These colors blend through gradients and lighting effects, enhancing depth, while the triangular chip highlight carries the brand’s sharp and edgy image, making red, orange, and yellow ideal for a matching advertisement banner.
